description: You regain rounds of rage or raging performance when you drop a foe.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Rage or raging song class feature.

sections.text: Whenever you reduce a foe to 0 or fewer hit points while you are raging or using raging song, you regain 1 round of rage or raging song (your choice if you have both abilities), as long as the number of Hit Dice that foe possesses are equal to or greater than 1/2 your character level. You cannot use this feat to regain more rounds of rage or raging song than your daily maximum number of rounds.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Rage or raging song class feature
name: Recovered Rage
